page.title: 15LINCOLNSHIRE MOBILE LIBRARY
page.content: The mobile library stops about 20 times a day and the library lends about 3000 books a week. When they get back to the main library the requested books are found ready for the next days round. They serve 60 villages and 3 schools which are all too far from town to use the main library. The most popular childrens books are about the FAMOUS FIVE by ENID BLYTON. The oldest book in the library is SENSE AND SENSABILITY and the most recent is called HEAVEN AND EARTH. The most popular author on the van is CATHERINE COOKSON. The mobile library visits our village on alternate Mondays.
